hr.fer.oop.lab3.welcomepack

Interface ManageableTeam

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClubTeam, NationalTeam, Team

    public interface ManageableTeam
    A team can be managed according to this interface.
    Author:
    OOP

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPlayerToStartingEleven(FootballPlayer player)
      Adds a player to starting eleven if a player is in registered player collection and there is a space for him within starting eleven.
      double calculateRating()
      Calculates and returns calculated team rating as follows: Club team: 70% sum of skills from registered players + 30% sum of emotions from registered players; National team: 30% sum of skills from registered players + 70% sum of emotions from registered players.
      void clearStartingEleven()
      Clears a collection of starting eleven.
      Formation getFormation()
      Formation getter.
      SimpleFootballPlayerCollection getRegisteredPlayers()
      Returns a collection of registered players.
      SimpleFootballPlayerCollection getStartingEleven()
      Returns a collection of starting eleven.
      boolean isPlayerRegistered(FootballPlayer player)
      Checks whether a player is registered in a team.
      boolean registerPlayer(FootballPlayer player)
      If a team is a national team, a player need to have the same country as a national team; whereas if a team is a club team, a player needs to have player skill which is higher or equal to club's reputation (note: in either case player registration will be successful if there is a space for a player)
      void setFormation(Formation formation)
      Sets the formation if it is not null.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayerToStartingEleven

        boolean addPlayerToStartingEleven(FootballPlayer player)
        Adds a player to starting eleven if a player is in registered player collection and there is a space for him within starting eleven.
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:
        true if a player is added, false otherwise.

      • isPlayerRegistered

        boolean isPlayerRegistered(FootballPlayer player)
        Checks whether a player is registered in a team.
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:
        true if a player is registered, false otherwise.

      • getRegisteredPlayers

        SimpleFootballPlayerCollection getRegisteredPlayers()
        Returns a collection of registered players.
        Returns:
        registered players.

      • getStartingEleven

        SimpleFootballPlayerCollection getStartingEleven()
        Returns a collection of starting eleven.
        Returns:
        starting eleven.

      • registerPlayer

        boolean registerPlayer(FootballPlayer player)
        If a team is a national team, a player need to have the same country as a national team; whereas if a team is a club team, a player needs to have player skill which is higher or equal to club's reputation (note: in either case player registration will be successful if there is a space for a player)
        Parameters:
        player -
        Returns:
        true if a player is added, false otherwise.

      • setFormation

        void setFormation(Formation formation)
        Sets the formation if it is not null.
        Parameters:
        formation -

      • getFormation

        Formation getFormation()
        Formation getter.
        Returns:
        formation

      • clearStartingEleven

        void clearStartingEleven()
        Clears a collection of starting eleven.

      • calculateRating

        double calculateRating()
        Calculates and returns calculated team rating as follows: Club team: 70% sum of skills from registered players + 30% sum of emotions from registered players; National team: 30% sum of skills from registered players + 70% sum of emotions from registered players.
        Returns:
        returns a team rating.
